note.query: SELECT COUNT(PlanDescription) FROM ConfigDB.aud.JobLog WHERE datediff("SECOND",StartTime,ISNULL(ENDTIME,getdate())) >=3600 AND StatusID<>2 AND JobID=(SELECT MAX (JobID) FROM ConfigDB.aud.JobLog WHERE PlanID IN(1,2,4));
note.title: [Alert] 当前 Job 执行超过1小时！
note.body: #### Job 执行超过1小时！ Check !
